name.japanese: スリラーバーク海賊団

keyMoments.title: Moria's Ambition Revealed
keyMoments.description: Gecko Moria reveals his plan to use captured shadows, specifically Luffy's, to achieve his dream of becoming Pirate King through the power of his zombie army.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Thriller Bark Pirates' ultimate goal and Moria's strategy of using others' strength rather than relying on his own crew's power.

keyMoments.title: Loss of General Zombie Tararan
keyMoments.description: Tararan, one of Moria's General Zombies and commander of the Spider Mice, is defeated by Brook and his shadow is purified, removing him from the crew permanently.
keyMoments.significance: First major loss for the Thriller Bark Pirates' fighting force, demonstrating the vulnerability of Moria's zombie army.
